Name: Polar Bear Riding A Ninja
About the game: Run away from a Polar Bear Riding A Ninja while throwing pineapples at various enemies to get MOAR PINAPPLES!!! Also save the world. Starring: You (as a stick figure) The Polar Bear (riding a Ninja) Pineapples!!!!! Pigeons Goats Pirates Sharks Lizards! and more....
